item.description:
boo·ty /ˈbo͞otē/

Noun:

  1. Valuable stolen goods, esp. those seized in war.
  2. A person's buttocks.

vor·tex /ˈvôrˌteks/

Noun:

  1. A mass of whirling fluid or air, esp. a whirlpool or whirlwind.
  2. Something regarded as a whirling mass.

Booty Vortex is back at Johnny D's to deliver the funk, soul  & disco as they have been since 2005.  Johnny D's is a great place to be part of the Booty experience:  great food, large dance floor and cold beer at a reasonable price.

So come on out and whirl your valuable stolen goods with us on 4 August!

The details:

  • Not familiar with Booty Vortex?

    Check out their website.
  • The cover charge for this show is $12 cash at the door.
  • The music starts at around 10:00.

    I'll be hanging to the left of the entrance starting at 9:00 p.m. and I'll be there until the music starts at 10:00.  As you pay your cover charge, look immediately to the left and over the room divider/window behind the door guys -- that's where I'll be.

    You can also ask the door guys where the Meetup people are and they'll direct you to us.

  • If you come to the show, please text or call me to find me, preferably text.

    I look like my profile picture, although I have a shaved head ... and I won't be wearing a knit cap on Satuday.  Once the music starts, I do wander around and look for folks (so it really helps if you posted a good picture of yourself), but texting me is the way to find me once the show starts.

    I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.

  • If you're driving to the show, note that there are street parking spots, but they may be difficult to find.

    Johnny D's has a good city parking map here.

  • If you're taking the T, the Davis Square Red Line stop is directly across the street from Johnny D's.
  • Here's a link to Johnny D's website.
  • This is a joint meetup with the Cambridge-Somerville Live Music and Social Fun groups.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers the afternoon of the show.
item.name: Booty Vortex @ Johnny D's
